nodes.text: Fiorah Blys was a Human female scientist who was the daughter of Rasmus Blys, one of Czerka Corporation's Special Executives. Fiorah wrote her thesis on the effects of carbonite freezing, and became an expert in biological weapons—Doctor Juvard Illip Oggurobb described her as a "gifted artist" in the field. Oggurobb recruited her to help the Alliance, albeit remotely from her lab.
